name: Weedmaps: Buy Local Weed
desc: Weedmaps is a go-to mobile app and web platform for cannabis users to discover and shop local dispensaries and products, while also serving as an essential marketing and operational tool for cannabis retailers and brands.

name: Leafly: Find Cannabis and CBD
desc: Leafly is a cannabis information and shopping platform available on mobile and web. It offers a searchable database of cannabis strains, effects, and local dispensaries. Leafly also provides educational content and product ratings to help users make informed decisions.

name: Grow with Jane - Cannabis plan
desc: Grow with Jane is a mobile app and web tool designed for cannabis home growers to track and manage their cultivation process. It offers personalized grow logs, reminders, and progress tracking while also providing strain info and a private journal, supporting users from seed to harvest with structured guidance.

name: MÜV Dispensary
desc: MÜV Dispensary is a Florida-based medical cannabis app available on iOS via the Apple App Store. It enables users to browse and purchase cannabis products (such as flower, edibles, and concentrates), manage orders, access tiered rewards, and connect with customer support—all within a single platform.

name: Affect: Addiction Recovery
desc: Affect: Addiction Recovery is a smartphone-based telehealth app offering a structured outpatient program for alcohol and drug use, including cannabis, opioids, stimulants, and prescription medications. It features counseling via secure video, medication support, behavioral tracking, contingency‑management rewards, and access to peer and group resources. Private, insurance‑covered, and clinically accredited.

name: Curaleaf
desc: The Curaleaf app allows registered users to browse products, view menus, place pickup or delivery orders from Curaleaf dispensaries, and track loyalty rewards. It features deal alerts, location-specific availability, age verification, in-app event notifications, personalized recommendations, and customer support. Available free on iOS and Android; functionality varies by state regulations.p

name: The Apothecarium Dispensary
desc: The Apothecarium app enables ordering cannabis products (flower, edibles, concentrates, tinctures, topicals) from local Apothecarium dispensaries in supported states. It offers express pickup, curbside, drive-thru, or delivery options, real-time order tracking, easy reordering, and a loyalty rewards program. Availability and services vary by location and local regulations, and the app is restricted to The Apothecarium/TerrAscend network.

name: WeedPro: Cannabis Strain Guide
desc: WeedPro: Cannabis Strain Guide provides a database of thousands of strains with details on flavor profiles, potency, genetics, and medical effects. It offers AI-driven recommendations based on user notes and preferences, and lets users rate strains and track experiences.

name: Curaleaf+
desc: Curaleaf+ is an iOS-only app available exclusively in select markets such as Florida and New Jersey. It lets registered users browse product menus, place pickup or delivery orders, and track loyalty rewards while surfacing region-specific promotions and notifications. Unlike the standard Curaleaf app, it focuses on targeted market offerings and iOS users.

name: Eaze
desc: Eaze is a mobile app offering on-demand cannabis delivery in supported regions, enabling users to browse products, verify age, place orders for same-day delivery, track orders in real time, and discover rotating deals. Available on both iOS and Android, it distinguishes itself by focusing on home delivery and real-time tracking features.

name: Quit Weed
desc: Quit Weed is a mobile app guiding users through quitting cannabis with features such as a withdrawal timeline, health improvements tracking, money-saved calculations, achievement rewards, and journaling over the crucial early recovery weeks. It focuses on motivation and progress visualization.

name: Grounded - Quit Weed Tracker
desc: Grounded is a mobile app for iOS and Android dedicated to helping users quit cannabis or take tolerance breaks, offering tools such as a quit journal, withdrawal symptom tracking and tolerance-reset timelines, daily mood logging, progress visualization (e.g., virtual tree growth), savings tracking, achievements, and community support.
